awd_titl_txt: Laboratory Equipment for Introductory Physics and           Astronomy
awd_abstract_narration: The Physics Department at Indiana University at South Bend will improve         its laboratory program and provide its students hands-on experience with        laboratory equipment which is so much a part of a scientist's life.  In         order to offer a more effective and up-to-date program, the Department          will purchase equipment in three specific areas:                                                                                                                        1) Computerization of the introductory physics laboratories;                    2) Utilization of telescopes and accessories in astronomy                          courses; and                                                                 3) Creation of a modest intermediate-level (mostly modern)                         physics laboratory.                                                                                                                                  The equipment will provide both physics majors and non-majors worthwhile        laboratory experiences and help develop the excitement needed for               learning and self-discovery beyond the classroom.
